name: BERGMUND
description: Thanks to new research and innovative technology, the upholstered chair offers optimum seating comfort. You can change the style at any time by replacing the grey chair cover with a cover in a different color or finish.

name: TOSSBERG
description: A sturdy chair for pleasant evenings with loved ones and good food. The soft, padded fabric cover and lumbar support ensure that you sit comfortably - even for long periods of time.

name: BRIMNES
description: Small spaces need smart storage. This closet has a clothes rail for shirts and dresses, shelves for folded clothes, shoes and bags - and a mirrored door so you don't need a separate mirror.

name: RAKKESTAD
description: You simply need a proper closet with all the basic functions. If you still don't have enough storage space, it's best to buy another closet from the RAKKESTAD series. Or two.

name: MITTZON
description: YTactile design, clever functions and the option to set the right height during assembly - the height-adjustable MITTZON desk increases your well-being and your ability to concentrate. With a 10-year guarantee.
